overview: GPT-5.2, OpenAI’s newest model focused on long context and front-end UI generation, will be available to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: GPT-5.2, OpenAI’s newest model focused on long context and front-end UI generation, will be available to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise.

detailed_explanation.title: Availability in GitHub Copilot
bullets: OpenAI GPT-5.2 will be available to Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise.
You’ll be able to select the model in the Copilot model picker from any of the following:
Visual Studio Code versions 1.104.1 and later, all modes: chat, ask, edit, agent
Rollout will be gradual. If you don’t see the new models yet, check back soon.

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Enterprise and Business plans : Administrators must enable the OpenAI GPT-5.2 in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see the respective model in the Copilot model picker.
Pro and Pro+ plans : Users can enable the model by selecting it in the model picker and confirming the one-time prompt.
Bring your own key : Within Visual Studio Code, select Manage Models from the picker, choose OpenAI GPT-5.2 , and enter your API key when prompted.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more
bullets: To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.

insights: Learn more To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot.
